title: Rebirth of the Vampire King
description: Dead bodies won’t stop mounting, but who’s counting?We lost our last battle, but I’m going to win the war—with or without Valentine.This new world has more obstacles than an assault course. Vengeful gods, vicious ambushes, and vampires with brooms where the sun doesn’t shine.When will I catch a break and get my happy ever after?Rebirth of the Vampire King is book six of the Blood Fire Saga
author: Bella Klaus
